blocks.lsp_integrates_text: Lumin integrates with SolarEdge and Enphase to extend the life of energy storage systems during outages and normal use.

blocks.title: Meet Lumin.
blocks.text|raw: Lumin® is the pioneer and market leader for responsive load control. The Lumin® platform is an addition to a standard electrical panel and makes ordinary circuits smart and responsive. Lumin® helps homeowners automatically or manually control their home’s microgrid to enhance and protect their investment in energy storage, participate in Demand Response Programs, or manage their energy in real-time to avoid costly service upgrades when adding Electric Vehicle chargers or switching to electric appliances. The Lumin® solution is valued by homeowners, solar + storage installers, utilities, electrical contractors and home builders.

question_lists.text_list|raw: Lumin Edge is initially targeted for demand response applications, but will also be available for solar + storage additional audiences later this year.
